member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.EndsWithAttribute
member.summary: 以特定字符串结尾的验证特性

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.PasswordAttribute
member.remarks: 密码长度为 6-18 位，包含至少一个字母和一个数字

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.StartsWithAttribute
member.summary: 以特定字符串开头的验证特性

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.StringContainsAttribute
member.summary: 包含特定字符串的验证特性

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.StrongPasswordAttribute
member.remarks: 密码长度最少 6 位，包括至少 1 个大写字母，1 个小写字母，1 个数字，1 个特殊字符

member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.UserNameAttribute
member.remarks: 长度 4-16 位，仅支持字母，数字，下划线，减号组合

member.summary: Default timeout value set in , or if none was set.

member.summary: Pops 2 values from the backtracking stack.

member.summary: Pushes 2 values onto the backtracking stack.

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_asciiLetters
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz".

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_ascii_20FF03FEFFFF07FEFFFF07

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_ascii_40FF030000000000000000
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in ".0123456789".

member.name: F:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generated.Utilities.s_ascii_7B0400800100004000000000
member.summary: Supports searching for characters in or not in " !#$%&*?@^".

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.AgeValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match with 4 alternative expressions.
○ Match '0' through '9'.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match '0' through '9' atomically, optionally.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '1'.
○ Match a character in the set [01].
○ Match '0' through '9'.
○ Match the string "120".
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.BankCardNumberValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [1-9].
○ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 9 and at most 29 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.ChineseNameValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [\u00B7\u4E00-\u9FA5] atomically at least 2 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

○ Loop greedily at least once.

○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match '\ud87a'.
○ Match a character in the set [\uDC00-\uDFE0].
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.DomainValidator
member.remarks: 不包含协议，如 https/http

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.DomainValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Loop greedily at least once.
○ 1st capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9A-Za-z] atomically at least once.
○ Match '.'.
○ 2nd capture group.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z] atomically at least twice.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.PasswordValidator
member.remarks: 密码长度为 6-18 位，包含至少一个字母和一个数字

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.PasswordValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Za-z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit.
○ Match a character other than '\n' greedily at least 6 and at most 18 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.PhoneNumberValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match '+'.
○ Match the string "00".
○ Match the string "86".
○ Match '1'.
○ Match a character in the set [3-9].
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 9 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: T:Furion.Validation.StrongPasswordValidator
member.remarks: 密码长度最少 6 位，包括至少 1 个大写字母，1 个小写字母，1 个数字，1 个特殊字符

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.StrongPasswordValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character atomically at least 6 times.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a Unicode digit.
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z].
○ Zero-width positive lookahead.
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
○ Match a character in the set [ !#-&*?@^].
○ Match any character other than a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.TelephoneValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match with 2 alternative expressions.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 3 times.
○ Match '-'.
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 8 times.
○ Match a sequence of expressions.
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Optional (greedy).
○ Match a Unicode digit exactly 4 times.
○ Match '-'.

member.name: M:Furion.Validation.UserNameValidator.Regex
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [-0-9A-Z_a-z] atomically at least 4 and at most 16 times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.
